programme.title: Im Alive
programme.desc: Koskettavia kertomuksia ihmisista, jotka taistelivat elainten hyokkayksia vastaan uhmaten kuolemaa ja valittamatta esteista tai seuraamuksista.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Wayde King ja Brett Raymer johtavat Yhdysvaltain suurinta akvaarioyritysta nimeltaan Acrylic Tank Manufacturing. Liikkeen ideana on rakentaa toinen toistaan upeampia akvaarioita!

programme.title: Cats of Claw Hill
programme.desc: Animal Planetin uusi saippuadokumenttisarja valottaa kotikissojen yksityista maailmaa kiehtovasti seuraten kissojen arkielamaa kissaperspektiivista.

programme.title: Cats of Claw Hill
programme.desc: Animal Planetin uusi saippuadokumenttisarja valottaa kotikissojen yksityista maailmaa kiehtovasti seuraten kissojen arkielamaa kissaperspektiivista.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: 3. kausi alkaa uusintana. Osa 1. Elainlaakarit Blue, Ross ja Lavigne pyorittavat menestynytta klinikkaansa Houstonissa. Heidan asiakaskuntansa koostuu kaikenkarvaisista lemmikeista. (The Vet Life, tosi-tv, USA, 2019)

programme.title: Alaska Monsters
programme.desc: Tiimi suuntaa Fairbanksin kaupungin ulkopuolelle syvalle Alaskan sisamaahan tutkimaan havaintoja Pohjoisen jattilaiseksi kutsutusta karhumaisesta otuksesta.

programme.title: I Was Prey
programme.desc: Patikoimassa ollut metsanvartija sattuu samalle polulle puuman kanssa. Vihainen supikoira hyokkaa koiranulkoiluttajan paalle Vancouverissa.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Bengalinkissa hairitsee ystavysten Shannan ja Lorin rauhaa ja ilkea uroskissa aiheuttaa huolta tulevalle emolle. Pystyyko Jackson auttamaan kissaongelmissa?

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 12/14. Krokotiilimiehena tunnetuksi tulleen Steve Irwinin perinto elaa hanen leskessaan Terrissa seka lapsissaan Bindissa ja Robertissa. Intohimoisina luonnonsuojelijoina he pyorittavat aivan erityislaatuista Australian elaintarhaa, jossa toimii myos huipputason villielainsairaala. (Crikey! Its The Irwins, tosi-tv, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Dodo Heroes
programme.desc: Brittilainen Marine Pen Farthing johtaa Afganistanin ainoaa virallista elaintenpelastusorganisaatiota. Sotilaan pelastamat kuusi koiraa taytyy saattaa taman luokse Teksasiin.

programme.title: My Tiny Terror
programme.desc: Kissojen kayttaytymiseen keskittynyt terapeutti Jacqueline Wilson kay suur-Los Angelesin alueen pikkukoirien luona yrittamassa korjata niiden pahoja tapoja.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Elainlaakari Jeff yrittaa pelastaa kohtauksen saaneen parta-agaman. Elainlaakari Amyn taidot joutuvat koetukselle, kun kissan rutiinisteriloinnissa tapahtuu komplikaatioita.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Wayde King ja Brett Raymer johtavat Yhdysvaltain suurinta akvaarioyritysta nimeltaan Acrylic Tank Manufacturing. Liikkeen ideana on rakentaa toinen toistaan upeampia akvaarioita!

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Elainlaakari Lavigne tekee bionisen leikkauksen pitbullterrierille, jolta on revennyt eturistiside. Uusi elainlaakari Fedke hoitaa kissan pelottavannakoista otokkaista vammaa.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Rakastetulla bassetilla on sairaus, joka saattaa hankaloittaa elainlaakari Rossin leikkausta. Elainlaakari Lavigne ei halua teknikkoa avukseen oman koiransa leikkaukseen.

programme.title: Teksasin riistanvalvojat
programme.desc: Teksasissa kaikki on suurempaa, mukaan lukien riistanvalvojien tyo. He suojelevat osavaltion luonnonvaroja ja valvovat sen 27 miljoonaa asukasta.

programme.title: Hurjimmat minielaimet
programme.desc: Maailman syrjaisimmista kolkista loytyy pienenpienia elaimia, jotka herattavat suurta kunnioitusta. Nama liskot ja otokat ovat monstereita, jotka hallitsevat elinymparistoaan miltei yliluonnllisilla kyvyillaan: ne voivat esimerkiksi muuttaa muotoaan ja ampua myrkyllista verta silmistaan.

programme.title: Hurjimmat minielaimet
programme.desc: Matkalla Etela-Afrikan Mpumalagaan etsitaan Kapin myyrarottaa. Otuksella on valtavat partakoneenteravat hampaat ja se tunnetaan nimella maanalainen kuningas.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Pete rakentaa Alabaman Appalakeille veikean vakoilumajan, jonka varustuksiin kuuluu puhekojeita, piilokaytavia, salahuoneita ja paljon muuta!

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Realitysarjassa Tia Torres kuntouttaa kaltoinkohdeltuja amerikanpitbullterriereita ehdonalaisvankien avulla Villalobosin pelastuskeskuksessa. Tekemista riittaa, kun tyontekijoiden pyrkimyksena on myos muuttaa ihmisten asenteita kiisteltya ja pelattya koirarotua kohtaan. Villalobosissa valmistaudutaan Isaac-myrskyyn. Mariah ja kaksoset selvittavat vuosien takaista mysteeria.

programme.title: Kaikki kissoista
programme.desc: Ohjelmassa tutustutaan harvinaisiin kissarotuihin: don sfinx, highlander, serengeti, minskin, kuriilien bobtail ja sokoke.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 12/14. Krokotiilimiehena tunnetuksi tulleen Steve Irwinin perinto elaa hanen leskessaan Terrissa seka lapsissaan Bindissa ja Robertissa. Intohimoisina luonnonsuojelijoina he pyorittavat aivan erityislaatuista Australian elaintarhaa, jossa toimii myos huipputason villielainsairaala. (Crikey! Its The Irwins, tosi-tv, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Elainlaakari Jeff yrittaa pelastaa kohtauksen saaneen parta-agaman. Elainlaakari Amyn taidot joutuvat koetukselle, kun kissan rutiinisteriloinnissa tapahtuu komplikaatioita.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Puukuiskaaja Pete Nelson kumppaneineen rakentaa piilopirtteja puuhun niille, jotka tahtovat kosketuksiin luonnon ja sisaisen lapsensa kanssa.

programme.title: Painajaiseni: Joe Exotic
programme.desc: Joe Exotic antaa yhden viimeisimmista pidatystaan edeltavista haastatteluista. Entinen tyontekija paljastaa totuuden G.W.Zoo -elaintarhasta, jonka isoja kissa pelastetaan.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Realitysarja. Billy ja Amy Brown ja heidan seitseman lastaan elavat omavaraistilalla syvalla Alaskan eramaassa, missa toimeentulo riippuu yhteistyosta.

programme.title: Teksasin riistanvalvojat
programme.desc: Teksasissa kaikki on suurempaa, mukaan lukien riistanvalvojien tyo. He suojelevat osavaltion luonnonvaroja ja valvovat sen 27 miljoonaa asukasta.

programme.title: Ihanat kamalat lemmikit
programme.desc: Jaksossa nahdaan pizzaa rakastava mopsi, koira, joka tuhoaa taloa ja takapihaa seka myohemmin talleilta karkaava hevonen, joka vapauttaa myos muut hevoset.

programme.title: Harvinaisten elainten jaljilla
programme.desc: Forrestin uskaliaimpiin ja jannittavimpiin tutkimusretkiin kuuluu matka Galapagos-saarille, missa han etsii tarunhohtoista Fernandina-kilpikonnaa.

programme.title: Im Alive
programme.desc: Koskettavia kertomuksia ihmisista, jotka taistelivat elainten hyokkayksia vastaan uhmaten kuolemaa ja valittamatta esteista tai seuraamuksista.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Wayde King ja Brett Raymer johtavat Yhdysvaltain suurinta akvaarioyritysta nimeltaan Acrylic Tank Manufacturing. Liikkeen ideana on rakentaa toinen toistaan upeampia akvaarioita!

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Kausi 3, osa 2. Elainlaakarit Blue, Ross ja Lavigne pyorittavat menestynytta klinikkaansa Houstonissa. Heidan asiakaskuntansa koostuu kaikenkarvaisista lemmikeista. (The Vet Life, tosi-tv, USA, 2019)

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Kausi 3, osa 3. Elainlaakarit Blue, Ross ja Lavigne pyorittavat menestynytta klinikkaansa Houstonissa. Heidan asiakaskuntansa koostuu kaikenkarvaisista lemmikeista. (The Vet Life, tosi-tv, USA, 2019)

programme.title: Alaskan erakot
programme.desc: Pakkanen kiristyy ja paivat lyhenevat, mika vaikeuttaa ansojen tarkastusta. Edna ottaa ohjat omiin kasiinsa, kun sudet tuhoavat hanen ansansa.

programme.title: I Was Prey
programme.desc: Jouluna kavelylla olleet isa ja tyttaret joutuvat kengurun hyokkayksen kohteeksi. Leijona vetaa naisen jalat kaltereiden toiselle puolelle elainten suojelukeskuksessa.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Sotajalalla. Jacksonin apua pyytavat pariskunta, joka ei pysty muuttamaan yhteen vihamielisten kissojensa vuoksi, ja sotaveteraani, jonka kissa suhtautuu vakivaltaisesti tyttoystavan koiraan.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 13/14. Krokotiilimiehena tunnetuksi tulleen Steve Irwinin perinto elaa hanen leskessaan Terrissa seka lapsissaan Bindissa ja Robertissa. Intohimoisina luonnonsuojelijoina he pyorittavat aivan erityislaatuista Australian elaintarhaa, jossa toimii myos huipputason villielainsairaala. (Crikey! Its The Irwins, tosi-tv, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Dodo Heroes
programme.desc: Elainsuojelujarjesto Animal Defenders International on tyoskennellyt 40 vuotta sirkuselainten kieltamiseksi. Suurimmat pelastusoperaatiot tapahtuvat Perussa.

programme.title: Atlantan akvaario
programme.desc: Afrikanpingiviinien yhteiso toivottaa uusimmat jasenet tervetulleeksi parittelukauden jalkeen. Lisaksi uusi merisaukko laitetaan lajitoveriensa joukkoon.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Tavallinen paiva on tuntematon kasite Planned Pethood Plus -elainlaakarilla. Lukemattomille asiakkaille ja heidan lemmikeilleen elainlaakari Jeff Young on viimeinen toivo.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Wayde King ja Brett Raymer johtavat Yhdysvaltain suurinta akvaarioyritysta nimeltaan Acrylic Tank Manufacturing. Liikkeen ideana on rakentaa toinen toistaan upeampia akvaarioita!

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Yuki-bulldoggi on syonyt jotain sopimatonta, ja elainlaakari Bluen selvittaa nyt mita. Elainlaakari Lavignen adoptoima kissa tarvitsee hoitoa kaksoisamputaation jalkeen.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Kaapiovuohi saapuu vastaanotolle paiseen takia. Kameroita vieroksuva suojelukoira tyollistaa elainlaakari Lavignea. Elainlaakari Blue pitaa sukupuolenpaljastamisjuhlat.

programme.title: Teksasin riistanvalvojat
programme.desc: Teksasin riistanvalvojat suojelevat seka ihmisia etta elaimia Yhdysvaltain toiseksi suurimman osavaltion laajalla alueella. Tyopaivien aikana vastaan tulee kaikkea mahdollista salametsastajista tulvien uhreihin ja vaarallisiin villielaimiin.

programme.title: Dr. Dee: Alaska Vet
programme.desc: Sarjassa seurataan elainlaakari Dee Thornellin elamaa Alaskan rajaseudulla. Hanen monenkarvaiseen asiakaskuntaansa kuuluu elaimia rekikoirista poroihin ja lemmikkikarhuihin, ja Dee saa henkilokuntineen hoidettavakseen aaritapauksen jos toisenkin. Tarvittaessa apuun riennetaan tiettomien taipaleiden taa niin lentokoneella, moottorikelkalla kuin koirienkin vetamana.

programme.title: Kissapelastajat
programme.desc: Shaun taistelee kovassa tuulessa pelastaessaan suloista Tigger-kissaa, joka on ennenkin jaanyt kiikkiin korkeuksiin. Lisaksi Tom tulee hatiin Fritterin luo.

programme.title: Kissapelastajat
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 6/10. Canopy Cat Rescue on erikoistunut puihin kiivenneiden kissojen pelastamiseen. Kun nelijalkainen saadaan vihdoin takaisin tukevasti maanpinnalle alkaa selvitystyo, kenen lemmikki on kyseessa. (Treetop Cat Rescue, tosi-tv, USA, 2015)

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Realitysarjassa Tia Torres kuntouttaa kaltoinkohdeltuja amerikanpitbullterriereita ehdonalaisvankien avulla Villalobosin pelastuskeskuksessa. Tekemista riittaa, kun tyontekijoiden pyrkimyksena on myos muuttaa ihmisten asenteita kiisteltya ja pelattya koirarotua kohtaan. Hurrikaani Isaac on iskemassa New Orleansiin. Tia vie koiria turvaan evakuointikeskukseen. Kuka osuu hirmumyrskyn reitille, ja millaista tuhoa myrsky aiheuttaa tarhalla?

programme.title: Kaikki kissoista
programme.desc: Rotutietoa, historiaa ja muita kummallisia kissafaktoja seka sopoja temppuja, joiden ansiosta kissasta tuli koiraa suositumpi lemmikki Amerikassa.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 13/14. Krokotiilimiehena tunnetuksi tulleen Steve Irwinin perinto elaa hanen leskessaan Terrissa seka lapsissaan Bindissa ja Robertissa. programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Realitysarja. Puukuiskaaja Pete Nelson kumppaneineen rakentaa piilopirtteja puuhun niille, jotka tahtovat kosketuksiin luonnon ja sisaisen lapsensa kanssa.

programme.title: Shark Attack Files
programme.desc: Craig OConnell ja Andy Casagrande seilaavat Serenajokea ylavirtaan ja yrittavat selvittaa, miksi nuoret harkahait uivat joelle, ja miten ne valttavat siella elavat krokotiilit.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Realitysarja. Perhe pistaa pystyyn fasaaninmetsastyskilpailun kiitospaivan kunniaksi. Billy ja Ami yllattavat lapset kotitilan uusilla asukkailla.

programme.title: Teksasin riistanvalvojat
programme.desc: Teksasin riistanvalvojat suojelevat seka ihmisia etta elaimia Yhdysvaltain toiseksi suurimman osavaltion laajalla alueella. Tyopaivien aikana vastaan tulee kaikkea mahdollista salametsastajista tulvien uhreihin ja vaarallisiin villielaimiin.

programme.title: I Was Prey
programme.desc: Paul Templer oli kanootissa Victoria-putousten lahella, kun virtahepo veti hanet veden alle. Viisivuotias Jade DeMoss etsi aitia, kun jokin hyokkasi hanen paalleen Teksasissa.

programme.title: Fish Or Die
programme.desc: Dokumenttisarja. Tiimi kulkee vihjeen perassa syrjaiselle joelle Gronlannissa, mista pitaisi loytya rautua. He selvittavat myos tarua, jonka mukaan atlantinlohi pesii joella.

programme.title: Im Alive
programme.desc: Koskettavia kertomuksia ihmisista, jotka taistelivat elainten hyokkayksia vastaan uhmaten kuolemaa ja valittamatta esteista tai seuraamuksista.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Wayde King ja Brett Raymer johtavat Yhdysvaltain suurinta akvaarioyritysta nimeltaan Acrylic Tank Manufacturing. Liikkeen ideana on rakentaa toinen toistaan upeampia akvaarioita!

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Kausi 3, osa 4. Elainlaakarit Blue, Ross ja Lavigne pyorittavat menestynytta klinikkaansa Houstonissa. Heidan asiakaskuntansa koostuu kaikenkarvaisista lemmikeista. (The Vet Life, tosi-tv, USA, 2019)

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Elainlaakari Lavigne tekee bionisen leikkauksen pitbullterrierille, jolta on revennyt eturistiside. Uusi elainlaakari Fedke hoitaa kissan pelottavannakoista otokkaista vammaa.

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Armed with his trusty 1913 Bradshaws Continental Railway Guide, Michael Portillo ventures east to the independent state of Ukraine, a land that was once part of the Russian empire. He starts his journey in the capital, Kiev, where he encounters mummified monks and two of the strongest women in the world. After a stop-off in the city of Lviv, he boards the night express to Odessa, where he finds a vibrant, cosmopolitan city, and rounds off this leg of his journey by visiting the opera.

programme.title: Worlds Most Dangerous Roads
programme.desc: TV presenter Alex Brooker and comedian Ellie Taylor are thrown together for an adventure across Java where erupting volcanoes pose as big a threat as the roads.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben heads to the forests of the North Cascade Mountains in Washington, USA, to live with British-born Lynx Vilden, who employs some tricks of the Stone Age to survive in the Wilderness.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Paddy McGuinness, Cherry Healey and Ruth Goodman get exclusive access to some of the largest factories in the world to reveal the secrets behind the epic-scale production of our favourite products. 4/6

programme.title: The Worlds Deadliest Weather
programme.desc: Personal stories of those caught up in sometimes deadly natural catastrophes, accompanied by camera footage showing meteorological phenomena, including hurricanes, earthquakes, monsoons and more.

programme.title: Japan with Sue Perkins
programme.desc: Sue Perkins enjoys a night out with Kyotos geishas, goes free diving with some ama divers and visits Hiroshima. In Tokyo, she explores how the Japanese are tackling the future.

programme.title: Deadly 60
programme.desc: Steve finds out who is boss as he faces a real life King Kong. He gets up close to Africas largest snake and stakes out a crocodile nest to try and catch a sneaky thief red-handed.

programme.title: Deadly 60
programme.desc: A special episode featuring some of the best moments from the series. Steve races a cheetah, rescues a king cobra and shares some of those rare times when things go wrong. 11/11

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Adventurer Ben Fogle meets Vanessa Forero deep in the Sierra Nevada de Santa Marta, an isolated mountain range in the north of Columbia.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: On Great Blasket Island, off the coast of Ireland, Ben stays with London couple Dan and Emily, who landed an extraordinary job as island caretakers on Europes rugged western frontier.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: This eye-opening series follows the drama and hardships experienced by four Alaskan households in different corners of this merciless territory as they battle to make it through a long, dark, freezing winter. The huge US state of Alaska boasts some of the worlds most deadly weather, with temperatures regularly plummeting to a lethal -80 Fahrenheit, freezing exposed limbs in minutes. Yet it is also home to some of the toughest, most resilient, most isolated people in the world. Life is all about survival in the face of unrelenting weather, scarce resources and man-eating carnivores.

programme.title: Exploration Volcano
programme.desc: Mount Nyiragongo in the Democratic Republic of Congo erupts. It engulfs the nearby city of Goma with lava, taking thirty-three lives and destroying almost four-thousand homes. Chris arrives in Goma to find everyone else evacuating. After surveying the destruction, Chris joins volcanologists on an expedition to the source of the eruption.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace visits a cherry Bakewell factory in Stoke on Trent that produces 250,000 tarts every day, and meets the team of 12 employed to precisely place the cherries on top by hand. Cherry Healey learns the tricks of avoiding a soggy pastry bottom when baking at home, and visits a factory where almonds are roasted and milled to make butter. Historian Ruth Goodman discovers the origins of frangipane as a perfume in 17th-century Paris, and discovers how the modern cherry Bakewell recipe was arrived at by accident.

programme.title: Wild France
programme.desc: The Atlantic winds blow on a country blessed by nature. A country where the rich, fertile soil has given birth to an exceptional wildlife.

programme.title: Alexander Armstrong in Sri Lanka
programme.desc: Xander has a close-up encounter with a cobra, and travels north to Tamil country where he helps dig up mines remaining after the bitter civil war that raged for 30 years.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: This eye-opening series follows the drama and hardships experienced by four Alaskan households in different corners of this merciless territory as they battle to make it through a long, dark, freezing winter. The huge US state of Alaska boasts some of the worlds most deadly weather, with temperatures regularly plummeting to a lethal -80 Fahrenheit, freezing exposed limbs in minutes. Yet it is also home to some of the toughest, most resilient, most isolated people in the world. Life is all about survival in the face of unrelenting weather, scarce resources and man-eating carnivores.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Adventurer Ben Fogle meets people who have turned their backs on Western society and set up home in some of the most isolated locations on Earth. Ben meets Niall, who rescues and cares for street dogs in Koh Samui.

programme.title: Exploration Volcano
programme.desc: Mount Etna, Europes most active volcano, is in the experiencing its longest spate of eruptions in recent years. Our story starts almost a year earlier, long before the eruptions reach full force. Etna fires off intermittently and, on the summit, a new volcanic crater grows. What will happen next?

programme.title: Empire with David Olusoga
programme.desc: History gets personal as historian David Olusoga uncovers how British imperial history is family history.

programme.title: Ben Fogles Lost Worlds
programme.desc: Ben visits the Caribbean island of Montserrat, where a volcano devasted large areas in the 1990s. Within two years most of the population had fled their homes. Ben uncovers unique stories of heroism and loss.

programme.title: Worlds Most Dangerous Roads: The Extra Mile
programme.desc: Rhod Gilbert presents a selection of some of the funniest and most dramatic moments from the series.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben meets Yorkshire-born Moli and his Californian wife Noelle in Tanzania, who run a safari business and live nomadically in a remote African wilderness.

programme.title: Empire with David Olusoga
programme.desc: Historian David Olusoga uncovers how the British Empire lives on across the world.

programme.title: Panorama: Can Climate Scientists Save the World?
programme.desc: Panorama meets some of the brightest minds in climate science advocating more drastic action to halt climate catastrophe - including controlling the power of the weather.

programme.title: Worlds Most Dangerous Roads: The Extra Mile
programme.desc: Rhod Gilbert presents a selection of some of the funniest and most dramatic moments from the series. 2/2

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo takes in Georgia and Azerbaijan as he journeys through the former Russian empire. He begins in the port of Batumi, discovers a surprise 19th-century tea plantation in the West Georgian countryside, visits a private museum dedicated to Joseph Stalin - the most infamous Georgian of all - and discovers that a Briton was the first to conquer the highest mountain in the Caucasus range. Arriving in Azerbaijan, he learns about its role in the 19th-century oil industry.

programme.desc: Rhod Gilbert presents a selection of some of the funniest and most dramatic moments from the series.

programme.title: Deadly Mission Shark
programme.desc: Steve Backshall is on a mission to create a new generation of shark saviours, but first he needs to find his team. Steve takes 12 young UK hopefuls to boot camp.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: On Great Blasket Island, off the coast of Ireland, Ben stays with London couple Dan and Emily, who landed an extraordinary job as island caretakers on Europes rugged western frontier.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace is in South Shields at a clothing factory where they produce 650 waxed jackets a day. He follows the production of water-resistant jackets from the arrival of 500-metre-long rolls of undyed cotton through to dispatch.

programme.title: Wild France
programme.desc: We start off in the heart of Provence that lies in the hills that join the sea to the high Alps. A land of fragrance and colour, prized by emperors and kings and whose famous light has attracted the greatest painters. 2/2

programme.title: New York: Americas Busiest City
programme.desc: Anita Rani, Ade Adepitan and Ant Anstead join 5.5 million commuters on the iconic Staten Island ferry, the subway and citibikes to find out about commuting in New York. 1/3

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: On the brink of losing everything shes worked for, Sue travels to Fairbanks, to officially buy her precious Kavik River Camp or else she will be left alone in the cold. Moments before what could possibly be the worst spring breakup of the season, Andy and Kate must move their dogs to an alternate location, or they will die in the flood.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben heads to northern England and stays with host Paul in Lincolnshire onboard his 30-year-old converted military truck. He discovers why Paul traded living in a house for life on the road.

programme.title: Exploration Volcano
programme.desc: Volcano expert Chris Horsley returns to the Spanish Canary Island La Palma. The Cumbre Vieja eruptions destructive lava flow has ruined thousands of homes and lives.

programme.title: Robson Green: Worlds Most Amazing Walks
programme.desc: Robson Green explores an ancient trail along the stunning Jurassic Coast in Dorset, and comes face-to-skull with a giant Pliosaur, also known as a Sea-Rex

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild
programme.desc: The adventurer returns to meet previous contributors who turned their back on the rat-race. In the wilds of Queensland he revisits the ever-resilient Bette, who, in her 80s, lives alone in a ramshackle house.

programme.title: Worlds Most Dangerous Roads: The Extra Mile
programme.desc: Rhod Gilbert presents a selection of some of the funniest and most dramatic moments from the series. 2/2

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben spends time with Julia Pryke, who left behind a comfortable life in Berkshire, England, to live in a derelict two-bedroom farmhouse in the remote Hungarian countryside.

programme.title: Robson Green: Worlds Most Amazing Walks
programme.desc: Robson Green sets out on one of the worlds most iconic pilgrimages: the Camino de Santiago, in search of what makes this journey so meaningful to so many.

programme.title: Fishing Impossible
programme.desc: The team have been tasked with catching Ling from the WWI and WWII wrecks of Scapa Flow in Scotland, but as its so cold the fish will be tucked into the wrecked ships and theyll need an ingenious plan to try to catch them. 8/10

programme.title: Food: Delicious Science
programme.desc: Michael Mosley and James Wong reveal the delicious science hidden inside our food. Michael begins by trying the first meal most of us enjoyed - human breast milk.

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo embarks on a classic rail journey from Amritsar to Shimla. He helps to feed the thousands and travels the railway routes used by millions of migrants during Partition.

programme.title: Junamatka Eurooppaan
programme.desc: Kausi 6, 6/6. Kauden paatosjaksossa Michael Portillo tutustuu Uttar Pradesh -osavaltion paakaupunkiin Lucknowiin ja yrittaa selvittaa totuuden vuoden 1857 Lucknowin piirityksesta, mika enteili suoran brittihallinnon alkua Intiassa. Sitten Portillo matkustaa miljoonakaupunki Kalkuttaan, missa han muistelee intialaista Nobel-palkittua runoilijaa Rabindranath Tagorea. Portillo tarkastelee myos Intian rikasta tekstiiliteollisuutta ja sen modernisoitumista. Upeat kankaat ovat aina olleet tarkea osa Intian kulttuuria.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

He tries everything to uncover this non-existent society, making everyones lives miserable in the process. Eventually, in an attempt to restore some peace, the pupils and teachers decide to give him exactly what he wants.

A mysterious clock appears showing exactly how long they have to get to school. When it looks like they arent going to make it in time, they stop the clock which effects the space/time continuum.

Ivandoe and Bert must risk all, entering the Swan Palace and avoiding the appalling Royal Family, in order to fulfill their promise to King Axalotyl, King of the Deep.

programme.desc: Theos play is being put on - yay! But the auditions are awful - boo! When a Shard in a spotlight gives the illusion of talent, L.J. leaves it there to help Theos show. Unfortunately, the Crimson Lord makes an unexpected guest appearance.

programme.title: Jade Armor
programme.desc: Theos play is being put on - yay! But the auditions are awful - boo! When a Shard in a spotlight gives the illusion of talent, L.J. leaves it there to help Theos show. Unfortunately, the Crimson Lord makes an unexpected guest appearance.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Every time Mush-Mush has tried to surprise his friend with a gift, Chep has always found out what it was. But Chep promises that this time he wont. And Lilit, who is too honest to keep a secret, promises she wont let Chep know what the surprise is. Both of them find this so hard! But Mush-Mush is one step ahead of them...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mushpie loves to sing. Only problem she is terrible at it! But Lilit, who has never heard her sing before, wants to make Mushpie happy and organizes a concert for her to sing in front of all the other Mushables... who are terrified at the idea! But Lilit doesnt have the heart to admit this to Mushpie.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mushpot wishes he could roll back the seasons and relive being a Mushler, our friends get him to hang out doing cool Mushler stuff. But this just shows that Mushpot is no longer able to do all those things. Sigh! However, when our friends find a map that points to a treasure he buried when he was a Mushler, Mushpot realises its just the Mushler experience he needed.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush cant figure out why his sense foot keeps buzzing like crazy... until an earthquake shakes the forest. Mush-Mush is sure he predicted it! Convinced he can now predict the future, Mush-Mush starts making predictions for everyone in Mushton...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Everyone in Mushton is finding that their precious wooden things are being munched and destroyed by someone or something. All the evidence points toward Truffs new woodworm pet: Chompski. But Truff refuses to believe Chompski would do such a thing! Its up to Chep, Lilit and Mush-Mush to convince Truff. But first they have to catch Chompski in the act!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy watches the Lemmings play Hide-n-Seek and cannot refrain from sabotaging their game by revealing their hiding places. The Lemmings challenge him to play against them. The two sides outdo each other in cunning and trickery, but they are equally good. For the last decisive round, the opponents decide to extend the game zone to the entire savanna.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have organized a mega party at the cabin. This is obviously not to Grizzys liking and the bear throws them out. The Lemmings discover a cave where the party is even more fun, but their ruckus drives out the bats who seek refuge in the cabin. Terrified of them, Grizzy tries everything to get rid of them and understands that the most effective thing is the Lemmings ghetto blaster.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy needs the fridge to keep his fish cold, but the Lemmings want it to make ice for their miniature ice skating rink. When Grizzy finds a new model robot air conditioner that is both rapid and efficient, the problem seems to be solved: each party will have their own source of cold. But when the Lemmings activate the robots artificial intelligence, the gadget starts to feel a powerful love for the person who resembles him most in his new surroundings: the fridge. Grizzy and the Lemmings will do everything to break up this budding romance and recover the cold sources that are rightfully theirs.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a white bear that fell out of a zoos refrigerated truck. After consulting the encyclopedia, he realizes that he and the bear are brothers of the same species! He decides to follow the encyclopedias instructions to the letter and take care of his brother during his hibernation. This runs counter to all of the Lemmings favorite activities. The Lemmings decide to create a false encyclopedia page which says that they too are bears. Grizzy is now obliged to treat them like brothers as well.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings hard rock concert is driving Grizzy mad. After kicking them out, Grizzy requisitions their ghetto blaster and listens to a relaxation cassette to calm down. The Lemmings discover an ancestral tree whose engraved strips of bark cast targeted maledictions. To recover their material, the Lemmings decide to drive Grizzy out by cursing him with the Ten Plaques of the Savanna.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Inspired by a magazine, Grizzy decides to redo the cabins interior design. To make sure everything is perfect, he ousts the Lemmings and their electric train. By chance, the Lemmings discover an underground futuristic premises in the middle of the savanna. From this secret place, they can see the entire savanna on a giant screen, down to the very inside of Grizzys cabin just like in a sandbox video game. By using the menus, they can have an impact on reality and thus... on Grizzy!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a magic stick that functions as a Yummy divining rod. Grizzy steals their stick and finds a Yummy deposit in the savanna. To take control over Grizzys discovery, the Lemmings set a trap to draw the bear far from the deposit and transform it into an industrial chocolate factory. Grizzy will want to recover his chocolate deposit.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: An eclipse prevents the solar panels from supplying the cabin with electricity and Grizzy is disgruntledbecause he cant watch TV. When he discovers that the Lemmings are using fireflies to have a party withoutelectricity, Grizzy evicts the Lemmings and recovers the fireflies to fuel the solar panels. The Lemmingshappen upon a jewel that gives them total control over the fireflies.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings recover a jar of Yummy from an automatic distributor but before they can enjoy it Grizzy confiscates the treat. In exchange, he leaves them the keyring that came as a gift. The Lemmings arent interested until the keyring lands in a magic vial which gives it an extraordinary power: stick the keyring onto any object and it will shrink to the size of a plastic miniature figurine!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is jealous of the Lemmings new game: an interactive dance mat connected to the TV where the idea is to jump around and perform dance sequences. As they fight over the mat, Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a hidden mechanism in one of the Great Wall of Chinas watchtowers. The mechanism activates a game on the walls paving stones that is similar to the interactive mat, only life size. On your marks, get ready, dance!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is bored of queuing for a trampoline park, so secretly bounces in through a window using a trampette. But he soon gets on the wrong side of a young show-off boy who keeps stealing Teddy and throwing him in hard-to-reach spots. To settle their row, they agree on a race around the trampoline park first place wins Teddy. Will Mr Bean triumph before hes chucked out for jumping the queue?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma is struggling to sell items from her knitwear stall at the market, so sends Mr Bean to collect a sheep costume he can wear to attract customers. Once at the fancy dress shop however, Mr Bean gets stuck in the sheep costume and has to travel back to the market wearing it. Things go from bad to worse when Mr Bean takes a short cut across the field and gets caught up in a flock of real sheep!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean spots a rare book - the Teddy Bear Haunting - in a bookshop, but its too expensive to buy. He secretly tries to read it in the shop until hes thrown out. To his dismay someone else then buys the book so he follows the buyer around trying to read over his shoulder. Will Mr Bean manage to get to the end of the book before getting spotted?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy are enjoying a day at the arcade, when Mr Bean gets carried away with the dance machine, knocking Teddy onto the floor. Teddys picked up, put on a trolley of stuffed toys and figurines and soon enough, hes been put in the claw machine as a prize! Mr Bean has run out of coins, so has to find a way of winning Teddy back without looking like hes cheating!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy are looking forward to seeing a once-in-a-lifetime comet but it wont appear until 4am! He tries to stay up, but its useless he keeps dropping off. So instead, Mr Bean decides to go to bed and set an alarm yet he over-winds the clock and it breaks! With all the shops closed, his only option is to build his own complicated version to make sure he doesnt miss the comet

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs Wicket makes Mr Bean drive her to the hospital to get her ingrown toenail seen to and asks him to wait. Mr Bean gets bored, and on a wander around the hospital he finds a spare doctors outfit with stethoscope great Teddy - Ill give you a check-up! But a nurse spots him, and thinking hes a new doctor Mr Bean is asked to visit patients. How long can he keep it up before hes found out?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mush-Mush and Chep lose Lilits flying disc down a snake tunnel, he is confident he can get it back. All animals love Chep and no-one knows more about snakes than he does. But this snake is not to be messed with! When they finally sneak into the snake tunnel, they learn why the snake has been acting so strangely...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: All the Mushables have fun zooming down a long mudslide except Chep, who just cant get up the courage to do it. But when Fung and Miff tease him for being scared, he promises that he will do something that no Mushable has ever done before... ride a grasshopper! Chep is in for the ride of his life!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Lilit creates a friends tree mapping out who everyone is best friends with in Mushton, she realizes Muddler has no friends at all. Unable to accept this, Lilit slips away to try and befriend him. But Muddlers perception of friendship is somewhat unique, meaning Lilit now needs the help of her two best friends, Mush-Mush and Chep, to escape from Muddlers clutches.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Having rescued a Mushlet, Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit becomes heroes in Mushton, and theyre loving it! So Mushlers create a rescue team - but, alas, no one needs saving! How can you be a hero when there is nothing to be heroic about?!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: The Beacon Mushroom that guides the Mushables back to Mushton in the dark has gone out. So Lilit lights up and stands in its place for the night... and soon gets quite bored! Lilits good deed has her regretting her gift - shes basically just a lamp! But when her light goes out, Lilit instantly regrets regretting it: she wants her gift back!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings try to catch a bat to play rodeo, disturbing Grizzy as he plays his favorite game on the rangers mobile. But when the phone is hit and its alarm activated, a submarine sonar sound is emitted. When the bat hears it, it seems to become docile.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have a blast testing every app on the rangers tablet one by one. Grizzy, who is starving, sees that the cupboards are bare. When he realizes that one GPS app can give the itinerary to the nearest chocolate spread store, Grizzy requisitions the tablet.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the rangers latest acquisition: a 3D printer that will duplicate anything at all in miniature format. Grizzy wants to redecorate the cabin with figurines bearing his effigy, but first he needs to get rid of the Lemmings. Without getting them mixed up with their perfect resin replicas.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a strange gateway to a parallel world. On the other side, there is the same cabin, only it doesnt belong to a ranger. Its a chocolate spread museum, where the curators are... another Grizzy and other Lemmings, all with very different personalities.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings clumsily destroy the TV remote control while fighting over who gets to watch their favorite program. While looking for a backup zapper, they happen onto a top secret Canadian Army prototype that enables you to apply the usual controls: play, pause and fast forward to living beings.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover that by changing the speed limit sign on the side of the road they can create a huge draft that is just perfect for their extreme kiting game.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While trying to stop the Lemmings from playing their extreme trampoline game, Grizzy slips on the canvas and unwittingly executes an amazing somersault in front of his beloved she-bear. Seeing that she wants more, Grizzy decides to become a champ in the sport. But for that to happen, the Lemmings will need to let him work out.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have hitched up a racoon with a sweet tooth to their sled and get a ride by throwing cookies in front of the creature with a sling. To recover the supply of cookies, which were to be his afternoon snack, Grizzy has no qualms about making the Lemmings sled skid out of control. When the sled hits a superheros spacecraft, a mysterious costume falls out.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings come up with a ride worthy of a county fair in the living room. Awakened, Grizzy throws their juice extractor out the window and the rodents land in the neighboring science station where they accidentally wake up a mammoth! A friendship is born between them. The Lemmings drag the mastodon into their game, and he transforms the entire cabin into a Ferris Wheel. Grizzy, who was trying to doze in peace, wakes up in a panic.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings play with poseable figurines of wild Canadian animals. When Grizzy sees that the bear figurine has been put inside a little cage, whereas those of the Lemmings are gathered around a mini-jar of chocolate spread, he decides to join in the party and take control of his own figurine.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is in the library studying his family heritage. Someone brings to his attention Mr Beans resemblance to a certain Lord Bean. Mr Bean sets off to track down his ancestral home (a castle) in Scotland where he is welcomed with open arms. But owning a castle is not cheap. Can Mr Bean escape before he runs out of money and has there been a case of mistaken identity?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and his beloved car find themselves in a crash for crash battle with his arch nemesis the Reliant Robin. Its a contest to find out who can hold their nerve the longest. Does Mr Bean win? Is his car left unscathed? And more importantly do we find out who the driver of the Reliant Robin really is?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has got everything ready for Irmas birthday; card cake candles but he just needs to get her some flowers. But nothing goes to plan as Mr Bean inadvertently causes a car crash involving a bride on her wedding day. Theres no time to lose as Mr Bean promises hell get the bride to the church on time. Irma is not a happy lady as Mr Bean is distracted by the task in hand.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is keen to own a brand new smart phone when he discovers all the wonderful things it can do. But after a trip to the mobile phone shop he is horrified at how much they cost and decides to build his own one. Beans phone may be bulky but it comes with a whole range of built in gadgets especially useful during a race to The Tower of London.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A confused Japanese tourist couple mistake Mr Beans house for a hotel and because of the language barrier it is difficult to explain otherwise. When the hapless holidaymakers offer to pay to stay Mr Bean and Mrs Wicket see a way of making some money and pretend their house is indeed a hotel. But its not long before the tourists start to smell a fish.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While Grizzy fishes, a penguin comes over and sees that the bears bucket is empty. He decides to help him and catches piles of fish. Impressed, the bear brings the penguin back to the cabin, where a friendship rapidly strikes up. This pleasant and friendly new companion quickly arouses the Lemmings curiosity. They lure the penguin away on the sly and replace him with another one whos not nearly as clever. Grizzy will quickly see through the trickery.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Just as Grizzy settles into the couch by the fireside, the Lemmings come charging into the living room on their new mount, the vacuum cleaner. Irritated, the bear throws the mechanical charger into the fireplace, which blows up. Freezing air sweeps into the cabin. Seeking a source of heat, Grizzy decides to move into the science station greenhouse where the temperature is controlled by a drone. But the bear is unaware of what he carries in his luggage: the Lemmings!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have a new playmate: a walrus! The rodents ride the creature throughout the cabin, then make him slide down the roof before starting all over again.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When Grizzy goes fishing, the Lemmings jump on the opportunity to transform the cabin into a giant ice slide. Upon his return, the bear puts an end to the rodents bobsleigh party and gets ready to savor his days catch. But the Lemmings steal his fish and draw the bear outside the cabin. Grizzy must try to recover his lunch while protecting his territory from a rodent invasion.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy pinches a magic statue from the Lemmings that has the power to make objects appear in real life. All you have to do, is pin the photo of ones desires upon it. Too bad for the rodents snow-bike! Grizzy replaces the vehicles photo with the portrait of his beloved she-bear who stayed behind in Canada. Barely arrived in African, the she-bear disappears again, victim of the rodents trickery. It is the outbreak of a bitter dispute.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Annoyed by the Lemmings new magnetic train, Grizzy propels the whole lot of them far from the cabin. The rodents land in the neighboring hut of a sorcerer and a mysterious mask falls onto one of them, endowing him with the power of telekinesis. The Lemmings are thrilled! They return to the cabin to explore this new magic power. Perched upon pieces of furniture, they fly around the room to finish their life-size flying train game!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: When a rich man writes Scooby into his will, the gang must spend a night in his creepy mansion with kooky relatives and a spooky phantom to collect Scoobys share.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: When the gang learns of a sorcerer and some mysterious happenings at a snack factory, they head out to investigate and uncover the truth about the troubling haunting, but Shaggy and Scooby stay busy investigating a yummy snack.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Frustrated by the Batwheels distracting affinity for holiday festivities, Batwing decides to go solo to thwart Mr. Freezes evil Christmas-time plots. However, Batwing and the Batwheels soon realize that stopping Mr. Freeze is much harder when they all arent working together as a team.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After the rest of the Batwheels are incapacitated and Gothams beloved holiday mascot, Ike Cicle, is captured by Mr. Freeze, Batwing realizes that going solo isnt all its cracked up to be. Now its up to her to rescue her friends, and work with them to save Christmas in Gotham.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Mac and Tosh Gopher to build them a home underground. Daffy cant remove rocks from the area fast enough and fails to ask for help.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: After a hot cocoa disaster, Santa Claus hires The Looney Builders to build him a new toyshop in time to save Christmas.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A confused Japanese tourist couple mistake Mr Beans house for a hotel and because of the language barrier it is difficult to explain otherwise. When the hapless holidaymakers offer to pay to stay Mr Bean and Mrs Wicket see a way of making some money and pretend their house is indeed a hotel. But its not long before the tourists start to smell a fish.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: While Mr. Bean is taking photos of wildlife, he sees big footprints belonging to a dinosaur. He starts running away but then gets an idea to take a photo of these footprints, hoping hell become famous. However, the dinosaur turns out to be part of a set for a movie called Jurassic Hero and Bean is added to the cast.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean accidently causes Mrs Wicket to be hospitalised and in need of a wheelchair. Back home Mr Bean has thoughtfully set up a bell service so that he can be at Mrs Wickets beck and call at any time of day or night. Mrs Wicket likes this...a lot. The bell doesnt stop ringing and an exhausted Mr Bean finds himself running up and down the stairs carrying and fetching until he eventually loses patience with his patient.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Beans car has broken down and he is late to meet Irma for a night at the opera. Mr Bean finally arrives but he is refused entry to the theatre because of his filthy attire. Forced to borrow some clothes from the local launderette Bean is mistaken for the star of the show and ends up on the stage giving the operatic performance of a lifetime.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When one of the toy cars of his racing track set becomes broken, Mr. Bean decides to buy a new one but since his Mini has a flat tire, he decides to take a taxi. The taxi driver deliberately drives around the town and stops for gas and lunch in the hopes of getting a higher fare. Bean tries to escape, but other passengers mistake Bean as the driver, and Bean reluctantly drives the taxi.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to impress Irma who is infatuated with the hunky deliveryman. Bean tries to improve his physique at the gym but has little success. Instead he opts for an inflatable muscle suit. Irma is indeed impressed and Beans plan seems to be working until the suit gets punctured and Bean makes the mistake of re-inflating it with helium. As Bean floats off into the sky will Irmas admiration be punctured?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is initially charmed when a seemingly cute seagull turns up on his windowsill. Bean feeds the gull and invites the bird inside. But its not long before the seagull in the flat turns out to be a cuckoo in the nest taking over Beans home eating all his food controlling the TV and sleeping in his bed. Bean starts to regret taking on a new best friend in place of good old reliable Teddy.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean sees a new toy car in the window of the local department store Havlotts and decides he must have it. But on the way to the toy department Mr Bean gets stuck in the lift. He tries his best to entertain his fellow passengers but they arent very appreciative. How can Mr Bean resolve the situation and get the toy he so desperately wants?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: It is a nice sunny day and Mr. Bean and Mrs. Wicket are relaxing in the garden, Mr. Bean attempts to sit beside her in the cool shade of her outdoor umbrella but Mrs. Wicket refuses. He decides to design his own umbrella for himself and Teddy. As he starts digging, he discovers - to his surprise - a bomb. He tries to disarm it, unfortunately, his attempt only accelerates its countdown.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean finds himself lumbered with an unwanted pet in the form of a four-legged ball of pink fur with piggy eyes and a penchant for earthworms. Encyclopedias leave him none the wiser as to the identity of the pesky creature but Bean cant bring himself to just abandon it. The puzzle is eventually solved after a picnic in the park and a raid on the local pet shop.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean forgets the golden rule: never fall asleep in the bath when youve got a chicken in the oven. So what romantic meal can he quickly rustle-up for his luckless girlfriend, Irma Gobb? The cheese from the mousetrap? The flower from the vase? A meal is eventually provided by an uninvited guest.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The nasty tennis player is big and angry and wants his ball back. The one Mr. Bean managed to throw on the roof of a house across the road. Paralysed with vertigo sixty feet up on a windowsill, he is eventually brought to earth by the helpful intervention of a neighbours pet gerbil.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Eating too many sweets gives Bean a terrible toothache, and when all other attempts at curing it are exhausted, he reluctantly visits the dreaded dentist.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After (accidentally) rescuing a kitten from a tree Mr. Bean is set to have his picture in the newspaper! The photographer arrives with the grateful lady cat owner, the scene is set, smiles all roundbut then disaster strikes when Bean is continually upstaged by his hair.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Mr Bean goes to watch his favorite TV show, he hears loud noises from the neighbors. He moves to the garden but he cannot escape the cacophony of trumpet drilling and crying babies. Bean starts thinking about revenge...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Envious of all the attention his landlady is receiving because of a broken leg, Mr. Bean decides to break his leg too. When he ends up in hospital under the care of the Matron from Hell he discovers there are some kinds of attention even he doesnt enjoy.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Whilst trying to redecorate the hall, Bean is obstructed at every turn by his landladys vile one-eyed cat. Bean pops it in the dustbin to keep it out of the way for a while. Just his luck that its rubbish collection day.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A quick shop turns chaotic as Mr. Bean battles a mile-long list and a wonky trolley, turning a simple errand into a full-blown comedy of errors.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Scrapper gives Bean fleas and Bean is forced to call in the pest control person. His flat will take 24 hours to fumigate.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is out shopping when it starts to rain. Taking refuge in a trendy coffee bar, Bean is fascinated both by the brewing machinery andthe amount of money people will pay for small cups of coffee! Scenting a fortune to be made, Bean opens up his own, strange, successful coffee bar ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wakes up on a freezing cold winters morning to discover that the boiler is broken and no sign of the repairman.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma wants a romantic break; Bean doesnt. Its too expensive. Irma kidnaps Teddy and refuses to give him back unless Bean promises to take her to Paris. Caught between his inability to pay and his love of Teddy Bean doesnt know what to do! Until he spots a cat beauty competition in which first prize is a romantic break in Paris - if only he can catch Scrapper ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean wants to avoid lunch with Irmas Mum at all costs. He persuades Mrs. Wicket to let him join her on a coach trip to a concert.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is showing Irma his favourite tree in the park one day when he discovers a tree surgeon getting ready to cut it down. He darts up the tree and wont come back down. Irma loves this new side of Bean-ey! The tree surgeon is frustrated and tries various ploys to get Bean down. But can Bean make it to the toilet without being discovered and still save that tree?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket is persuaded by a jaunty estate agent to put her house up for sale. Bean is distraught -where will he live? Not Mrs. Wickets problem. Bean decides to hi-jack the sales process in order to deter all potential buyers -even if it means turning the whole house upside down!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants to learn skateboarding but hurts himself on his first try. Meanwhile, Miss Wince is showing off her new mobility scooter at Mrs. Wickets. Bean is entranced. He could do wicked ollies with that! He absconds with a souped-up scooter and heads straight to the skate park, ready to challenge Bruiser Senior and Junior ...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Like usual, Grizzy picks the door of the Rangers log cabin to come in and make himself comfortable, but this time its impossible to enter! The Lemmings have requisitioned the cabin for a party and barricaded themselves inside. Grizzy has no intention of waiting for an invitation to find a way to get in.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have got their hands on a pack of white beans which have very strange properties: when mixed with soda, anyone who eats them turns into a bouncing ball. Grizzy realizes that if he wants to take a nap, he must first get rid of the magic beans.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are having a blast with a bowling game they found in the Rangers storeroom. Grizzy hastens to destroy the pins to ensure his peace and quiet. But the Lemmings discover a remote-control device that can modify the balls weight. By setting it on maximum, the ball could knock over much more than pins: furniture, a bear and even a log cabin!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings inherit a crate that fell off a Canadian army convoy. Inside, a case emits a sort of laser beam that divides objects into multiple miniaturized versions of themselves.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Near the supermarket a machine hands out surprise eggs in exchange for a coin. Amongst the lots to be won, there is a super firework rocket the Lemmings dream of, and a piece of costume jewelry that Grizzy imagines himself giving to his lady-love.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a high-tech gadget that enables you to learn anything within seconds. He can now become the perfect bear!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the rangers house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: How can one peacefully watch a documentary on salmon fish, nice and comfy on the sofa, when the Lemmings are playing chemistry novices with a fun experiment box?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzys TV remote control is stolen by a partridge who collects high-tech objects in his nest perched high up in a tree. This is a case of absolute urgency!

programme.title: Tom and Jerry: Santas Little Helpers
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry are joined by Nibbles Mouse, aka Tuffy, as they ring in a wild wintertime celebration. Jerry and Tuffy are living the good life in Santas workshop until the day Tom is rescued by the Claus family! With Tom in the house, theres nothing but merry mayhem at the North Pole. But when the dust settles, can the comically destructive duo work together to save Christmas and learn the true meaning of friendship?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The gang get more than they bargained for when they try to shoo away a seemingly docile spider.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A Tom and Jerry chase through Postlewaite Manor results in major injuries to Cates, which places his defense of the Butlers Linen Gloves Boxing title in jeopardy. But never fear, Tom will step into the ring and defend Cates title.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom guards Maudes prize pumpkin until it is time for her to enter it into the local fairs big competition.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Rick and Ginger forget Toms birthday, the tomcat moves in with the one person who appreciates him, the local Zoos gorilla, Cuddles.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Papa tells his fractured version of the Tom Thumb story to the Bavarian mouse trio.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: There has been a wave of sock thefts from the local laundromat and the Cat and Mouse Detectives have been hired by Pontius Pig to solve the case before his laundry business goes belly up.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is shocked when Teddy receives a birthday card from Beans girlfriend, Irma Gobb. The bears Birthday had completely slipped his mind. And what do you get for the teddy that has everything? A morning in a toy shop, burgers for lunch and a slap up tea party, of course. (But only if you can afford it.)

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Beans landlady is hopping mad on finding molehills on her lovely croquet lawn. Bean looks to get hammered if he does not rid the old lady of the cuddly little half-blind culprit. He fails dismally with his eccentric mole extermination methods and ends up simply taking the pesky rodent for a ride.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wickets Nephew is staying with her when he wins two tickets to an Outward Boundcourse. She refuses to go, but then ropes in Bean to look after the child. The two start a competition to see who will win the trophy. Bean is a relentless competitor, winning everything up until the point things start getting out of hand ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy have no plans, so decide to stay in bed all day. Mr Bean is determined that his feet cant touch the ground, so he pushes the bed around with a broom. He has to find ingenious ways to make his tea and toast for breakfast, brush his teeth and an even bigger challenge of ordering a pizza and collecting it from downstairs without getting out of bed!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Santas sleigh is damaged, the Batwheels must help Santa deliver presents to the children of Gotham, and stop the Legion of Zoom from trying to steal them!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Santas sleigh is damaged, the Batwheels must help Santa deliver presents to the children of Gotham, and stop the Legion of Zoom from trying to steal them!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Music Meister is stealing the singing voices of all the people in Gotham. Now its up to bashful Buff to gain confidence in his voice and use it to take down Music Meister. / When Batwings favorite Bat-Net gets ripped during a chase with Riddler, she must learn to let go of her old net. / Clayface, Gotham Citys messiest villain, arrives to cause trouble during Gothams annual Clean Up Day. / Buff makes a wish on a magic artifact for the other Batwheels to be turned into monster trucks, just like him!

programme.title: Krypto Saves the Day!
programme.desc: When a black cat crosses Kryptos path, hes determined to catch it before Halloween night is through. / Once upon a time the Penguin boy visits the Bear. He tries to entertain him and involve him in various activities but the Penguin spends most of the time playing with Masha.

programme.title: Krypto Saves the Day!
programme.desc: Krypto smells something special in a holiday package, and in his eagerness to grab the gift he makes a mess of Metropoliss festivities. / While escaping from a grizzly bear Ivandoe and Bert fall into an underground cave where a large Troll-woman in a party dress keeps them captive.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders prepare to host a big holiday lights festival in Looneyburg Park when an unexpected snowstorm prevents Looneyburgers from attending.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders prepare to host a big holiday lights festival in Looneyburg Park when an unexpected snowstorm prevents Looneyburgers from attending.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry Gokko
programme.desc: Its the middle of the night and Tom plays makeshift instruments creating loud music that wakes up Jerry. Jerry tries to put an end to Toms concert with no success. Tuffy wakes up and goes along with the music. Jerry decides to join in on the fun.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Inspired by a magazine, Grizzy decides to redo the cabins interior design. To make sure everything is perfect, he ousts the Lemmings and their electric train. By chance, the Lemmings discover an underground futuristic premises in the middle of the savanna. From this secret place, they can see the entire savanna on a giant screen, down to the very inside of Grizzys cabin just like in a sandbox video game. By using the menus, they can have an impact on reality and thus... on Grizzy!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a magic stick that functions as a Yummy divining rod. Grizzy steals their stick and finds a Yummy deposit in the savanna. To take control over Grizzys discovery, the Lemmings set a trap to draw the bear far from the deposit and transform it into an industrial chocolate factory. Grizzy will want to recover his chocolate deposit.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: An eclipse prevents the solar panels from supplying the cabin with electricity and Grizzy is disgruntledbecause he cant watch TV. When he discovers that the Lemmings are using fireflies to have a party withoutelectricity, Grizzy evicts the Lemmings and recovers the fireflies to fuel the solar panels. The Lemmingshappen upon a jewel that gives them total control over the fireflies.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings recover a jar of Yummy from an automatic distributor but before they can enjoy it Grizzy confiscates the treat. In exchange, he leaves them the keyring that came as a gift. The Lemmings arent interested until the keyring lands in a magic vial which gives it an extraordinary power: stick the keyring onto any object and it will shrink to the size of a plastic miniature figurine!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is jealous of the Lemmings new game: an interactive dance mat connected to the TV where the idea is to jump around and perform dance sequences. As they fight over the mat, Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a hidden mechanism in one of the Great Wall of Chinas watchtowers. The mechanism activates a game on the walls paving stones that is similar to the interactive mat, only life size. On your marks, get ready, dance!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings are hungry! While fighting over a jar of Yummy chocolate spread, the jar is destroyed. But Grizzy discovers an ingenious manner to recover the remains of another Yummy jar using instant Chinese noodles as inspiration. The result is delicious. Grizzy and the Lemmings will once again fight over this new Yummy-based recipe: Choco-noodles.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput is hiding in a school, and the only way for the Docs to get him is to anti-age zap themselves back into childhood. (obviously)After stalking him in the corridors and unsuccessfully evading detention slips from the Headteacher, they find themselves in class. Skinny is rather happy to be back, but Specs doesnt like tests or art or chemistry or anything that distracts him from his true objective. Each time they almost get him, Lamput is saved by the bell (and even becomes the bell), and its a race against home time to see if they can get Lamput before the Headteacher gets them.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: After repeated failures, the Docs finally realized what they were lacking: a good moustache! With their powerful facial hair, they are now unstoppable!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Boss and the Docs chase Lamput all the way into outer space! On the moon, Lamput discovers that aliens may be plotting to destroy Earth! He seeks the Docs for help.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A confused Japanese tourist couple mistake Mr Beans house for a hotel and because of the language barrier it is difficult to explain otherwise. When the hapless holidaymakers offer to pay to stay Mr Bean and Mrs Wicket see a way of making some money and pretend their house is indeed a hotel. But its not long before the tourists start to smell a fish.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: While Mr. Bean is taking photos of wildlife, he sees big footprints belonging to a dinosaur. He starts running away but then gets an idea to take a photo of these footprints, hoping hell become famous. However, the dinosaur turns out to be part of a set for a movie called Jurassic Hero and Bean is added to the cast.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Teddy is at the dry cleaners and Mr Bean is feeling lonely. Then he finds a new friend: a goldfish in the pond. Bean has a great time with his new friend, until he discovers that not all fish in the sea are such sweethearts.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Mr. Wicket gets a new lodger who isan Inventor, and a big nuisance, Bean discovers that he has to become inventive himself. But, when your enemy is clever and sneaky, you have to be even cleverer and sneakier. Bean has never lost a cleverness competition, but maybe there is a first time for everything!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang hits the ski slopes, but the fun is soon interrupted by the appearance of an evil Snowman Monster eager to scare all trespassers off his mountain.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Its Christmas Eve, and Fred is ready to solve a Christmas mystery! Unfortunately, the town the gang has arrived in is being attacked by a Pterodactyl, and it doesnt seem to have anything to do with Christmas!

programme.title: Tom and Jerry: Santas Little Helpers
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry are joined by Nibbles Mouse, aka Tuffy, as they ring in a wild wintertime celebration. Jerry and Tuffy are living the good life in Santas workshop until the day Tom is rescued by the Claus family! With Tom in the house, theres nothing but merry mayhem at the North Pole. But when the dust settles, can the comically destructive duo work together to save Christmas and learn the true meaning of friendship?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: We open on a sold sign in front of what will be Rick and Gingers house. Inside, the house is empty, except for Jerry, who slip slides merrily across the bare floors until the front door opens, and Rick and Ginger arrive in their new home.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry are in the middle of it when Tom hears someone singing the tale of a cat who met his unfortunate, painful end chasing a much superior opponent. The song is about underestimating your opponent. Every time Tom stops chasing Jerry, the music stops. When Tom resumes, the music resumes. This back and forth continues until the chase takes Tom right past a Singing Uncle Pecos. Tom skids to a stop causing Uncle Pecos to stop singing. Tom wants to prove the lyrics of Uncle Pecos song wrong, but in the end, Toms ego proves to everyone, including himself, that he is very much the subject of Uncle Pecos cautionary tale.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: After another attempt on Jerrys part to elude Tom, Jerry overhears Rick and Ginger talk about the possibility of getting rid of that useless cat. When Ginger sounds like shes considering the possibility, Jerry cant believe his ears!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the fondness of his beloved she-bear for meditation. To seduce her he sets out to prove to her that he too can attain the Zen attitude.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a super-secret Canadian Army prototype which resembles a simple computer keyboard. It has only several command keys: select, cut and paste, and delete, but the keys act directly on surrounding elements... as well as on living beings!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are having a blast with a bowling game they found in the Rangers storeroom. Grizzy hastens to destroy the pins to ensure his peace and quiet. But the Lemmings discover a remote-control device that can modify the balls weight. By setting it on maximum, the ball could knock over much more than pins: furniture, a bear and even a log cabin!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After the rains, to the great delight of the Lemmings, strange bouncing mushrooms have sprouted in the yard. To put an end to the Lemmings noisy games - which prevent Grizzy from enjoying his peace and quiet - Grizzy tramples the mushrooms. Only to realize that each crushed mushroom frees a cloud of spores that instantly creates... a bunch of identical mushrooms.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have laid hand on special magnets which turn any object they are stuck to into flying objects. Grizzy bears the consequences and is ejected out of the cabin on his couch, which has turned into a flying-couch. Upon landing, Grizzy discovers by chance that the magnet stuck to his forehead enables him to fly like Peter Pan.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: With a lion-tamers whip, a sugar bowl and lots of work, the Lemmings have successfully trained a caribou to go through their obstacle course. Grizzy cannot help but admire the performance. He decides to steal their idea, and the caribou, to create his own circus act and impress his lovely she-bear.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Yosemite Sam to build a dude ranch. Sam hurries the crew along, negatively impacting their work.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Witch Hazel hires The Looney Builders to make her house look spooky for Halloween, but things get complicated when they use her off-limits magical things.
